title: Salesforce Debuts Einstein 1 Studio Tools for GenAI Dev
author: Chris J Preimesberger
description: Salesforce has introduced a set of no-code, low-code, and pro-code tools for organizations to build their own predictive AI models, trained on Salesforce Data Cloud data.
cntitle: Salesforce 推出 Einstein 1 Studio 工具，用于 GenAI 开发
cndescription: Salesforce 推出了一套无代码、低代码和专业代码工具，供组织基于 Salesforce Data Cloud 数据构建自己的预测性 AI 模型。
